summary: Harry Potter Characters watching  IT
body:
Harry Potter Characters watching IT

Hermione: Pfft. A clown controling minds. There’s a potion for that, I can even do it.

Ron: *covering his eyes with the popcorn* is-is he co-coming??

Neville: *has left*

Luna: oh no! The poor little boy. He just wanted to play with his boat!

Ginny: *evil laughs with every jumpscare*

George: Fred, I know our next Halloween costumes

Fred: Way ahead of you, bro

Harry and Draco: *trembling and hugging in the corner*

DRARRY!!!

summary: Eat, You'll feel better.
title: Eat, You'll feel better.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MUfqXj

by HopeLupin

Remus Lupin finds herself completely and utterly alone on that dreadful October night. But what happens when everything she thought was true turned out to be a lie and an old lover appears at her apartment door.

[Remus/Sirius AU Set mostly after POA, with various flash backs and introduction set in Marauders Era]

Words: 3299, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Hope Lupin, Sirius Black, James Potter, Lily Evans Potter, Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Ginny Weasley, Albus Dumbledore, Kingsley Shacklebolt
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter
  • Additional Tags: Fem!Remus - Freeform, Pregnancy, Prison, Post-Azkaban Sirius, daughter - Freeform

summary:
Me: Look here! It's a couple minutes before I leave for school! I'll go on Tumblr for a bit!
*Resurfaces 2 hours later having...
body:
Me: Look here! It’s a couple minutes before I leave for school! I’ll go on Tumblr for a bit!

*Resurfaces 2 hours later having been through an emotional journey of everything I have been in the fandom of, and having my person opinions on everything throughly challenged*

summary: Sirius: You see James, there are four different levels of beauty. There are people who are born with an unprecedented and...
body:
Sirius: You see James, there are four different levels of beauty. There are people who are born with an unprecedented and eclipsing beauty, children are not always born with this gratifying quality. That level is called the Sirius Black beauty level.

James: Yes, if you say Padfoot, and what else?.

Sirius: The second level is that for those who are attractive but not enough, those people need to work a little harder. And that is the James Potter Level.

James: Hey, that’s not funny.

Sirius: Level three of beauty is for those people who are beautiful in appearance and intelligence. At that level they call it Lupín and Evans level.

James: Well, there you have a certainty.

Sirius: And finally there is that level where you can not do anything and you just let life make you what life wants.

James: What do you mean? What is the name of that level?

Sirius looking ahead: Look there James.

James sees Peter: Hi Peter. Sirius, I don’t know what you mean by … Oh, I see, that’s sad.

Sirius: I know Prongs, sometimes nature works in terrifying ways.

James: Well, there you have a certainty.

Sirius: And finally there is that level where you can not do anything and you just let life make you what life wants.

James: What do you mean? What is the name of that level?

Sirius looking ahead: Look there James.

James sees Peter: Hi Peter. Sirius, I don’t know what you mean by … Oh, I see, that’s sad.

Sirius: I know Prongs, sometimes nature works in terrifying ways.

blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: Antonin how's it feel to hear Barty admit he loves you too?
question: Antonin how's it feel to hear Barty admit he loves you too?
answer: Antonin: I never thought I would ever hear him say that to me, and nobody has ever told me they love me before (except my parents) so… it was fucking amazing.

reblog.comment: Antonin: I never thought I would ever hear him say that to me, and nobody has ever told me they love me before (except my parents) so… it was fucking amazing.

trail.content_raw: Antonin: I never thought I would ever hear him say that to me, and nobody has ever told me they love me before (except my parents) so… it was fucking amazing.
trail.content: Antonin: I never thought I would ever hear him say that to me, and nobody has ever told me they love me before (except my parents) so… it was fucking amazing.

summary: Lils, how are things?  Have you had ‘the talk’ with your parents yet?
question: Lils, how are things?  Have you had ‘the talk’ with your parents yet?
answer: Lily: I haven’t talked to them about it yet, no. I’m really scared and I’m putting it off. I know, I know. It has to be done. I just need to find my courage.

reblog.comment: Lily: I haven’t talked to them about it yet, no. I’m really scared and I’m putting it off. I know, I know. It has to be done. I just need to find my courage.

blog.name: mrs-malfcy
blog.title: o b l i v i a t e.

summary: hi, hello everyone! It’s nicole; back at it again with unoriginal ideas!!  i really think (and hope) this’ll be fun to do so...
body:
Get to know me; Potterhead edition

hi, hello everyone! It’s nicole; back at it again with unoriginal ideas!! i really think (and hope) this’ll be fun to do so let’s give it a try i guess.

the rules are pretty simple; you just reblog this

& make your own edits for each day. this is not

a competition therefore there is no prize, this

is purely for fun & for your followers to get to

know you. also, don’t forget to tag me when

you post it! i hope you’ll enjoy it, xox.

——

day one: your hogwarts house

day two: favorite character from your house

day three: favorite spell

day four: favorite class

day five: favorite professor

day six: favorite character in general

day seven: favorite friendship

day eight: favorite canon ship

day nine: favorite non-canon ship

day ten: favorite deathly hallow

day eleven: favorite book

day twelve: favorite movie

day thirteen: character you wish we’d seen more of

——

feel free to also use the hashtag #acciopotterhead so you can see others’ results as well <33

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?
